tests.name: test print_race prints a race with no cars
tests.test_code:
race = %NeedForSpeed.Race{title: "Need For Speed 2021", total_distance_in_meters: 350, cars: []}
io = capture_io(fn -> NeedForSpeed.print_race(race) end)
assert io == "ğŸ Need For Speed 2021 ğŸ
Status: Not Started
Distance: 350 meters

Contestants:

"

tests.name: test print_race prints a race with a red car
tests.test_code:
car = NeedForSpeed.RemoteControlCar.new(:red, "The Fox")
race = %NeedForSpeed.Race{title: "Need For Speed 2021", total_distance_in_meters: 500, cars: [car]}
io = capture_io(fn -> NeedForSpeed.print_race(race) end)
assert io == "ğŸ Need For Speed 2021 ğŸ
Status: Not Started
Distance: 500 meters

Contestants:

  1. #{IO.ANSI.red()}The Fox#{IO.ANSI.default_color()}
  Distance: 0 meters
  Battery: Battery at 100%

"
